math_problem.A2743: Kamile turned her computer off at 5 p.m. Friday, at which point it had been on for exactly 100 hours. At what time had Kamile turned her computer on?

math_problem.A2746: Three different numbers from the list $2, 3, 4, 6$ have a sum of 11. What is the product of these numbers?
